sentences.sCn: 名义上信奉基督教的国家

sentences.sContent: He was nominally in charge of his father’s printing company.
sentences.sCn: 他名义上掌管着父亲的印刷公司。

remMethod.val: 来自nominal(adj. 名义上的； 有名无实的)

words.tran: 名义上的；有名无实的；[会计] 票面上的

trans.tranCn: 名义上地； 有名无实地
trans.tranOther: officially described as being something, when this is not really true
